AI system






HA NOI (ILO News) - At Hanoi Industry Trading Investment Joint Stock Company (HITI), an AI-enabled vision system recently cut inspection time from 20 seconds to just 5 and boosted defect-detection accuracy from 95% to 99%. title: How We Went From 20+ Humans to 3 Humans + 20 AI Agents at SaaStr: More Work, Less Drama, Triple the Output
summary: A real-world case study on AI transformation in a $10M+ B2B community business Back in 2020, SaaStr was bursting at the seams. We had 20+ full-time employees. We’d just opened a second office down the hall in SF because we literally ran out of room. The team breakdown looked like what you’d expect in a... Continue Reading
